changeSet.author: Winston
changeSet.comment: When tagging information exists for Pre-Asset Tagging on a Purchase Order, this is the Asset Acquisition Type code to be used on the Asset Global (Add) document generated by processing a transaction using the Capital Asset Builder (CAB) create asset function.

column.name: PARM_DESC_TXT
column.value: The Asset Acquisition Type code to be used when the Asset Global Add document is generated by processing a transaction using the Capital Asset Builder CAB create asset function

changeSet.author: Winston
changeSet.comment: When tagging information exists for Pre-Asset Tagging on a Purchase Order, this is the Asset Acquisition Type code to be used on the Asset Global (Add) document generated by processing a transaction using the Capital Asset Builder (CAB) create asset function.

column.name: PARM_DESC_TXT
column.value: Capital Asset Acquisition Types codes representing non-expenditure additions not purchased These Type codes are not associated with and do not require the user to enter the following fields on the Asset Global Add document: Document Number, Document Type Code and Posted Date

changeSet.author: Winston
changeSet.comment: When tagging information exists for Pre-Asset Tagging on a Purchase Order, this is the Asset Acquisition Type code to be used on the Asset Global (Add) document generated by processing a transaction using the Capital Asset Builder (CAB) create asset function.

column.name: PARM_DESC_TXT
column.value: All Capital Asset Acquisition Type codes not otherwise specified in the NEW_AQUISITION_CODE parameter Allows system to identify non-capital asset acquisition type codes and then determines the availability of the following fields on the Asset Global Add document: Document Number, Document Type Code and Posted Date

changeSet.author: Winston
changeSet.comment: When tagging information exists for Pre-Asset Tagging on a Purchase Order, this is the Asset Acquisition Type code to be used on the Asset Global (Add) document generated by processing a transaction using the Capital Asset Builder (CAB) create asset function.

column.name: PARM_DESC_TXT
column.value: The Asset Acquisition Type code that will populate the Acquisition Type Code field when the Asset Fabrication document is initiated

changeSet.author: Winston
changeSet.comment: When tagging information exists for Pre-Asset Tagging on a Purchase Order, this is the Asset Acquisition Type code to be used on the Asset Global (Add) document generated by processing a transaction using the Capital Asset Builder (CAB) create asset function.

column.name: PARM_DESC_TXT
column.value: When tagging information exists for Pre-Asset Tagging on a Purchase Order, this is the Asset Acquisition Type code to be used on the Asset Global Add document generated by processing a transaction using the Capital Asset Builder CAB create asset function
